items.content_html: A simple Firebase-powered URL saver built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This app allows users to save useful links, track them visually, and delete all saved entries with a single action. Great for developers collecting resources, marketers saving lead pages, or anyone who wants a lightweight link tracker.

This app allows users to save useful links, track them visually, and delete all saved entries with a single action. Great for developers collecting resources, marketers saving lead pages, or anyone who wants a lightweight link tracker.
